main event: Four to six band-shaped elongated objects were observed in Jackson, Mississippi on 24 September 1956.
interesting points: The objects were observed for 10-15 seconds,The objects were the size of 1939 colorgent objects and widely spaced in a straight line,The objects were not maneuverable and held the same relative position,The sighting possibly resulted from insufficient data according to USAF,The objects gradually went out of sight and changed color to gray.
witness description: a person driving a car who glanced up
